Source_File: Create New SRO Process Excel File (4) Updated 06 30 2025 1414 TD.xlsx
Step_narr_in: nan nan nan nan Log into the ISM Tech Mobile App on a touchscreen tablet device Create a new SRO within the ISM Tech Mobile App Samsung Galaxy Tab A9 nan Tap on the Tech Mobile App menu icon located at upper left to display the menu nan ISM Tech Mobile App nan From the menu tap on New Service Order to select it and navigate to the New Service Order screen nan nan nan Tap on magnifying glass icon to the right of Customer to open the Customer Lookup screen nan New Service Order Screen nan Tap on Customer Number and enter the number if known (for this example 8095) nan Customer Lookup Screen nan Tap blue Search button to search for customer in ISM nan nan nan Tap on blue name of customer to display customer information records found in ISM is correct nan Customers Screen nan Tap on the back arrow located at upper left to go back a screen nan nan nan Tap on blue Search button to again search for customer in ISM with previously found information nan nan nan Tap on blue name of customer to select confirmed customer nan nan nan Tap three dots icon at upper right and select New Service Order from drop down nan nan nan Tap on magnifying glass icon to the right of Unit to open Unit/Item Search screen nan New Service Order Screen nan Tap on blue serial number of unit to select it and then tap Done in upper right of screen nan Unit/Item Search Screen nan Tap Done in upper right corner to create new Servive Repair Order nan New Service Order Screen nan Tap Done a second time to confirm nan nan nan

Select the appointment you are traveling to Travel to Site Tech Mobile App Select operation 20 labor to clock into labor for travel nan nan Click in and begin travel nan nan Tech drives to appointment Selects the labor operator again to prompt Clock out of labor when you arrive and select the work code for travel based on type generator (Resi vs Ind) nan nan Hit "done" nan nan

Clock into operation 10 parts for onsite service Perform Site Work nan Now select materials nan Click on planned at this time the actual will be empty Click on the material you want to consume nan nan Click on material they want to use Check the box consumed. Then click done nan nan Back arrow nan nan Clock out of labor nan nan Change the work code to service RESI/IND onsite depending on the type of service show in earlier screen Click done nan nan

nan nan nan nan Tap on menu icon Navigate to Materials in Appointment Details nan nan Tap on the Work Queue nan nan nan Tap the radio dial of the the appointment you are servicing. nan On the Wok Queue screen, select the appointment from either "Today" or " All" nan tap materials. nan Scroll to bottom of screen to reach materials nan tap the plus Add Material Upper right corner of material screen nan tap actual material nan nan nan tap the Search magnifying glass enter item to be used during servicing. Example: "15W40" for oil nan nan nan Search nan nan nan Select the material from the search findings. nan tap radio dial nan Tap Done nan At the top of the pop up nan Tap on Quantity to enter quantity. For this example of number of oil quarts needed 3. nan nan nan Tap Done nan At the top of the screen Do not change price or cost

Once on site work is complete, clock into operation 1/ 20 for the drive back to the shop, by tapping 1/20-Trouble Service-Labor Travel Leaving Site Tap Clock In from pop up nan Once at the shop or next appointment clock out of operation 1/20 by tapping 1/20-Trouble Service-Labor nan Tap Clock out from the pop up nan

Click SRO status on the appointment detail Change Status to Callback Tech Mobile App Add a note to the SRO note return service is required nan nan Click on hold to note the problem has not been solved nan nan
Click SRO status on the appointment detail Change Status Closed Tech Mobile App nan Close the SRO by clicking close nan nan nan The appointment will disappear from the work queue nan nan nan
